resources.string: Required to turn screen off and put the device to sleep
Start the service when device boots up
Service is running. Click to pause.
Please enable administrator privileges for Easy Lock.

If you set this option, Easy Lock will try to detect when you're pressing navigation bar soft keys and avoid locking the screen in such scenarios.

However, it's not guaranteed to work always.

This might impact the general performance of the device.

Do you want to enable this option?

If you disable EasyLock notification, Android system may end EasyLock in the background.

It is highly recommended that you keep notification enabled.

Are you sure you want to disable the notification?

Easy Lock needs Usage Access Permission for this option. Click OK to go to Security settings, select \'Apps with usage access\' and enable Easy Lock there. After that please press back to return to Easy Lock.
Please enable usage access to enable this option.
Double tap your status bar / lock screen / notification shade to quickly lock your phone.\nReduce the power button usage.\n(This feature is not supported in Android 8 and above)
Easy Lock - Double tap to sleep.
Previous purchase is still being processed, please try after a few seconds.
Please enable \'Draw over other apps\' permission for EasyLock.
Easy Lock requires \'Draw over other apps\' permission. Please click OK, enable it, and click back to return to app.

If you enable this, double tapping anywhere on the screen will turn the screen off. This can potentially interfere with other actions like double tap to zoom.

If you leave this option off, screen will be turned off only when you double tap status bar, nav bar etc. 

Are you sure you want to enable this?
Double tap anywhere in homescreen to lock
